column5: Lite beer should be outlawd. Coors lite was responsible for why I quit drinking altogether. The stuff will kill ya...
If I wanted water....I'd ask for it.
Are they available in Ontario or just Quebec!
i've never even heard of such a creature.. lol a 55 pack? clearly i need to go on vacation to Quebec.
haven't heard of them in ON yet...popular in QC and I've seen them at costco in AB
how much are the 48 packs at the beer store
Why 55? We need bring back Vanilla Coke.
A 55 pack hopefully it is in cans & not bottles (got some weight to it)........
it's been a looooooong time since I last drank a can of that stuff...... thanks for bringin' it up, now I want some.   lol
they sell them in 55 packs, so you can feel the same affect as a 12 of real beer.  G
speaking of bring things back....Doritos Texas Tang....those were good
I gor two 24's of water for 4.00 at shoppers drug on saturday.
i like the 55 pack, great to share with a buddy.
Amen.
I havn't seen them in Ont yet but I live on the border here and they are around $51.00 for 55 cans at costco......

seen em in montreal at costco this winter 55cans come in a hexagonal box with a platic liner so you can pop the top and fill with ice think they wher about $50. 42 cans of bud light lime was $26 with deposit they also have molson other molson products in the 55 pack
Ontario sucks when it comes to beer ! I just bought two 30 packs of ORIGINAL COORS.... not COORS LIGHT ... for 36 bucks in the states..... I was spoiled for a week ! hahahah

I was in quebec yesturday , right where the quake was,well val des bois at lac vert. I picked up a 12pk of coors light cans for 15 bucks?  My friend said costco has the 55pk's but i didnt have a card....did feel after shock rumble at 750pm that was cool...then the rain came,,

That's a crazy deal!  Never understood why they stop selling Coors in Ontario beer stores?  From what I remember when they did, it was pretty good. Now if they brought back to Ontario Coors, 55 packs, and Oscar Meyer Hotdogs, things would be so much more live-able in Ontario.

holy man, you need to live on the border! I got the luxury of cheap beer and liqour AND oscar meyer hotdogs! sault ste marie ontario, with a quick drive over to sault ste marie michigan haha. that reminds me im runnin low on bud and oscar meyers.......
I third the vanilla coke idea.. and the 55 pack haha
I was in QC 2 weeks ago, 55 pack Coors light was $51 at Costco

hahah I live about 25 minutes to the ferry across the St.Clair river !!! I always here everyone talked about the "beer" runs ... go get 5 cases and come home..... even with the tax/duty.... its still cheaper then buying it here
Keystone light.. just like coors.. but half the price
I don't care who you are that's funny!

You can buy the Molson Dry there as well, But you can only buy 10 cases per month at Costco in Quebec. It comes to nearly 60 bucks taxes and deposit in. But then you can return the empties and get another 5.50 back.  Rob C
I was doing groceries in a few stores this morning and generally speaking, for all brands, beer is $1 a bottle.
